name: Zombie Garden (SteveAnand)
description:
There's a Zombie Outbreak in your garden and you are the humanity's last hope to prevent the zombies from escaping your garden and infecting the civilization !

You have to save the World from a Zombie Apocalypse.

Hey Reader !

I'm a 17 year old aspiring game developer , and this is my first game. I'm using this game as a kickstarter , to raise enough money for my next project ( mainly for paying off the graphic artist and sound designer ). This game was coded by me and the graphics were done by a friend of mine. I hope you enjoy it !

Please do download it. Please.
